title: U.K. Aims to Ease Trucker Shortage With Visas Into 2022
content:
1. U.K. Aims to Ease Trucker Shortage With Visas Into 2022  The New York Times
  2. Petrol Retailers Association chief says fuel situation is 'very much better'  Sky News
  3. Fuel supply: Military to deliver petrol to UK garages from Monday  BBC News
  4. Britain still wrestling with ‘unprecedented demand’ for fuel, as govt ministers contradict themselves over when crisis will end  RT
  5. UK extends truck driver visa program as fuel crisis persists  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
